abstract: The scandal-filled legal battle between Wal-Mart Stores and its former senior marketing executive, Julie Ann Roehm, has been tossed from a Michigan state court, Portfolio.com reported.
lead_paragraph: The scandal-filled legal battle between Wal-Mart Stores and its former senior marketing executive, Julie Ann Roehm, has been tossed from a Michigan state court, Portfolio.com reported.

headline.main: Ex-Wal-Mart Executive’s Suit Dismissed from Michigan Court
